title: Alcohol free piña colada cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '170g (6 oz ) margarine', '170g (6 oz) caster sugar', '2 tablespoons coconut cream', '1 teaspoon rum extract', '1 tablespoon pineapple juice', '3 eggs', '170g (6 oz) self-raising flour', '60g (2 oz) desiccated coconut', '30g (1 oz) dried pineapple', 'For the filling', '1 (200g) tin pineapple, drained and juice reserved', '2 tablespoon caster sugar', '2 teaspoons cornflour', 'For the buttercream and topping', '110g (4 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '1 tablespoon milk', '2 tablespoons coconut cream', '225g (8 oz) icing sugar', 'desiccated coconut, to decorate', 'edible glitter, to decorate', 'fresh pineapple chunks, to decorate', 'glacé cherries, to decorate']
